column5: Welcome to San Antonio! When you stay with us, you are minutes from Lackland AFB, Sea World, shopping, dining, entertainment, downtown San Antonio & the famous River Walk. The home has an open floor plan, ample seating & a large master bedroom with garden tub. A deck in the backyard is a great place to relax. DVD PLAYER, SMART TV, Wii with kid friendly games.
column8: LOOK NO FURTHER! This IS YOUR BMT Destination!
